```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```

```{r setup}
library(waterpumpkwale)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r}
leaflet(location, options = leafletOptions(crs = leafletCRS(proj4def = "WGS84"))) |>
  addProviderTiles("OpenStreetMap") |>
  addMarkers(
    lng = ~`Long (WGS84)`,
    lat = ~`Lat (WGS84)`,
    popup = ~PumpID
  )
```
